data.title: Would Discourse be a good replacement for Yahoo e-groups?
data.text:
Welcome, @jod.z!

I’ve done it a couple of times. I think that the best resource here is: Sync WooCommerce Memberships with Discourse groups. It’s still a bit fussy figuring out all of the pieces.

If you need more help that you can get here, I can provide it, as it’s how I make my living. https://www.literatecomputing.com/. You can contact me directly or post in marketplace. I’m trying to be on vacation now, so I’m not as responsive as I usually am.

Excellent, thanks! I would much rather hire you than figure it out for myself

The link you provided is for WooCommerce Memberships, but we use Subscriptions. Hopefully it’s still possible.

I’ll be in touch if/when we want to proceed. Enjoy your vacation!
